code:
def pairwise_swap(head):
    if not head or not head.next:
        return head
    prev, curr = None, head
    while curr and curr.next:
        next_node = curr.next
        if prev:
            prev.next = next_node
        else:
            head = next_node
        curr.next = prev
        prev = curr
        curr = next_node
    return head

class ListNode:
    def __init__(self, val=0, next=None):
        self.val = val
        self.next = next

# Test
a = ListNode(1)
b = ListNode(2)
c = ListNode(3)
d = ListNode(4)
a.next = b
b.next = c
c.next = d

head = pairwise_swap(a)
while head:
    print(head.val, end=' -> ')
    head = head.next
print('None')
